docs.snippet: While Israelis have mixed views of Mr. Trump’s policy proposals, they admiringly describe him as “dugri,” a slang Hebrew term derived from the Arabic for “straight ahead.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: While Israelis have mixed views of Mr. Trump’s policy proposals, they admiringly describe him as “dugri,” a slang Hebrew term derived from the Arabic for “straight ahead.”
docs.abstract: Memo From Jerusalem; Republican presidential contender Donald J Trump has had less interaction with Israel than his Democratic opponent Hillary Rodham Clinton, but many Israelis appreciate his frankness.

headline.main: Israelis’ Favorite Thing About Donald Trump? His Style (to Put It Bluntly)
headline.print_headline: Israelis Are Divided on Trump’s Policies. His Main Allure: His Style (to Be Blunt).

docs.abstract: Jennifer Szalai First Words column examines America's demands for 'authenticity' in its politicians; holds shifting definition varies according to time period and individual opinion; notes Hillary Clinton and Donald Trump's struggles with authenticity in 2016 presidential election.

docs.snippet: The F.B.I. director all but indicted Hillary Clinton’s judgment and competence on Tuesday in terms that would be devastating in a normal election year....
docs.lead_paragraph: The F.B.I. director all but indicted Hillary Clinton’s judgment and competence on Tuesday in terms that would be devastating in a normal election year.
docs.abstract: New Analysis; FBI director James B Comey's explanation of decision not to indict Hillary Clinton for mishandling classified email includes severe criticism of her judgement; attack on her credibility undermines her own questioning of rival Donald J Trump's competence; Trump's unconventional campaign has chosen not to use Comey's comments in campaign ads.

headline.main: F.B.I.’s Critique of Hillary Clinton Is a Ready-Made Attack Ad

docs.snippet: The director said that “no reasonable prosecutor” would bring a case but called Mrs. Clinton and her staff “extremely careless” in their use of email....
docs.lead_paragraph: The director said that “no reasonable prosecutor” would bring a case but called Mrs. Clinton and her staff “extremely careless” in their use of email.
docs.abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation director James B Comey calls Hillary Clinton 'extremely careless' and questions her judgement for using private email server while she was secretary of state, but clears her of of criminal charges; extraordinary announcement sparks immediate controversy. leaving many to wonder what impact it will have on Clinton's presidential campaign.

headline.main: F.B.I. Director James Comey Recommends No Charges for Hillary Clinton on Email
headline.print_headline: Stern Rebuke, but No Charges, for Clinton

byline.original: By MARK LANDLER and ERIC LICHTBLAU

docs.snippet: The president made no mention of the F.B.I. director’s announcement hours earlier that no charges should be filed in the Clinton email inquiry....

docs.abstract: Pres Obama praises presumed Democratic presidential nominee Hillary Clinton during campaign rally with her in Charlotte, NC, saying no one has been more qualified for office; neither Obama nor Clinton mention announcement by FBI director James Comey earlier that day about ending investigation into Clinton's use of private email server when she was secretary of state.

headline.main: Obama Joins Hillary Clinton on Stump, Saying She ‘Has Been Tested’
